settings.markdownTextPattern:
### Welcome to the Admin dashboard

The Admin Dashboard provides you with the possibility to adjust SmartPatch and Basestation configurations.
To update a configuration, select a basestation.

dataKeys.name: Mac-Address
dataKeys.label: Mac-Address

settings.markdownTextPattern:
# Update Basestation Configuration
 
Adjust the configuration of the selected Basestation.
An adjusted configuration will be loaded upon restart of ${entityName}.

**Default configuration:**

Publishing to Thingsboard: 

*Enabled*

Local data logging on Basestation: 

*Disabled*

Publishing raw data to Thingsboard:

*Disabled*

Data Processing on Basestation: 

*Enabled*

Save Raw Data on Basestation: 

*Disabled*
settings.markdownTextFunction: return '# Some title\n - Entity name: ' + data[0]['entityName'];

config.title: Save Raw Data
config.titleTooltip: Save the raw SmartPatch sensor data.

config.title: Publishing Raw Data to Thingsboard
config.titleTooltip: Publish the raw SmartPatch sensor data to the Thingsboard database. Only works if Save Raw Data is enabled. If Save Raw Data is enabled and Publishing Raw Data is Disabled, the raw data will be saved on the Basestation device.

dataKeys.name: Mac-Address

settings.markdownTextPattern:

Adjust the configuration of all SmartPatches connected to selected Basestation.

**Default configuration:**

*1*
